intro: Dicellandra descoingsii, commonly known as the Socotra starfish tree, is a unique plant native to the island of Socotra. It belongs to the family Olacaceae and is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped leaves and woody structure. The plant grows as a shrub or small tree, often found in arid and rocky habitats. Its botanical features include small, white flowers and a unique seed dispersal mechanism adapted to its harsh environment. Dicellandra descoingsii is notable for its evolutionary adaptations and ecological significance in its native region.
